warezcdn.name: Mushoku Tensei: Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu
warezcdn.title: Mushoku-tensei ~Isekai ittara honki dasu~

imdb.title: Mushoku-tensei ~Isekai ittara honki dasu~
imdb.plot: A 34-year-old Japanese NEET is run over by a speeding truck and dies. Before he knows it, he is reborn as Rudeus Greyrat, and begins a new life full of adventure.

episodes.title: Jobless Reincarnation
episodes.plot: An unemployed middle-aged man involved in a fatal traffic accident awakens as an infant in a new world.

episodes.title: Teacher
episodes.plot: Rudy begins training with his new magic tutor and learning swordsmanship from his father. He makes rapid progress, but traumatic memories from his past life leave him too afraid to go outside. Is his second chance already doomed to failure?

episodes.title: A Friend
episodes.plot: Rudy begins to explore the village and rescues a green-haired child from a group of bullies. The two grow close practicing magic, but is there more to Rudy's new friend than he thinks?

episodes.title: Emergency Family Meeting
episodes.plot: The Greyrat family is overjoyed when Zenith announces that she's pregnant with a second child, but the mood takes a dour turn when Lilia reveals that she is also pregnant and Paul is the father. Will this be the end of Rudy's happy family?

episodes.title: A Young Lady and Violence
episodes.plot: Rudy arrives in the city of Roa, where he's supposed to spend the next five years tutoring the daughter of the local lord. His student, however, is more than he bargained for, and he'll have to fight to start his first ever job, let alone keep it.

episodes.title: A Day Off in Roa
episodes.plot: Rudy is officially Eris's tutor, but she doesn't want to learn anything but magic. As Rudy struggles to get her interested in other subjects, he realizes that non-stop lessons are causing her stress and proposes a day off in the city.

episodes.title: What Lies Beyond Effort
episodes.plot: Eris's 10th birthday is fast approaching, and her grandfather has invited nobles from across the kingdom to a dance party to celebrate. There's just one problem; Eris can't dance, and she's quickly losing patience with her lessons.

episodes.title: Turning Point 1
episodes.plot: Rudy reaches his 10th birthday, and Eris and her family plan a surprise party for him. Meanwhile, the strange orb hovering over the city remains a mystery as powerful entities across the world begin to take note of it.

episodes.title: A Chance Encounter
episodes.plot: Rudy and Eris find themselves stranded in the wilds of the Demon Continent. Their only chance to survive seems to lie in Ruijerd, a warrior of the infamous Superd Tribe of demons, but can he be trusted?

episodes.title: The Value of a Life and the First Job
episodes.plot: After Ruijerd, Rudeus, and Eris arrive in Rikarisu, Rudeus hatches a plan to make money economically. The group experiences growing pains.

episodes.title: Children and Warriors
episodes.plot: With their new money-making scheme in place, Dead End head out to track down a mysterious monster. Unfortunately, the job doesn't go as smoothly as they hope, and Rudy's plans may turn out to be a lot less safe than he thought.

episodes.title: The Woman with the Demon Eyes
episodes.plot: Rudies meets a girl with a mysterious eye.

episodes.title: Missed Connections
episodes.plot: Roxy, Elinalise, and Talhand discuss Dead End and future plans. Rudeus and Eris embark on a voyage to the Millis Continent.

episodes.title: No Such Thing as a Free Lunch
episodes.plot: Rudeus is imprisoned in a beast people village for a crime in which he is innocent. Rudeus awaits Ruijerd and Eris to rescue him, however, days pass with no sign of them. The village is attacked, presenting an opportunity for Rudeus.

episodes.title: Slow Life in the Doldia Village
episodes.plot: Rudeus and Eris find out more about Ghislaine and her relationship to the beast people's village. Eris begins to train Tona swordsmanship with the two eventually getting into a fight because of Eris' imminent departure.

episodes.title: Family Squabble
episodes.plot: Rudeus and his team arrive in Millishion. In the city, he comes across a kid being kidnapped. He follows them and gets into a fight with the kidnappers, but these people are actually involved with someone whom Rudeus knows very well

episodes.title: Reunion
episodes.plot: After having a family squabble with Rudy, Paul kept brooding and drinking. Will Paul's depression and anxieties continue? Or will he have a change of heart and talk to Rudy?

episodes.title: Separate Journeys
episodes.plot: The Dead End party departs for Central Continent. Roxy arrives at Rikarisu and has a chat with her old party member. She visits the Migurd village and meets her parents who tell them how they have been hearing about her from the travelers.

episodes.title: Route Selection
episodes.plot: Hitogami appears in Rudeus's dream again to give info about the whereabouts of Lilia and Aisha. Dead End party travel to Shirone Kingdom where Rudeus writes to Roxy and meets Aisha. Rudeus gets summoned to the royal palace to meet Roxy.

episodes.title: The Birth of My Little Sister, The Maid
episodes.plot: Rudeus is in desperate straits, imprisoned in a magic-proof dungeon by a despotic prince. But just when all seems hopeless, an unexpected visitor appears with a strange request. Will Rudeus be able to talk his way out of this one?

episodes.title: Turning Point 2
episodes.plot: Almost at their destination, the Dead End party encounters a mysterious man in the mountains, and things take a turn for the worst.

episodes.title: Dreams and Reality
episodes.plot: Dead End arrive in Fittoa and behold the aftermath of the Metastasis Event. Rudeus and Eris come to an understanding.

episodes.title: Wake Up and Take a Step
episodes.plot: Rudeus falls into a state of depression, and begins having flashbacks to his old life where severe bullying at school traumatized him into become a social recluse.

episodes.title: OVA: Eris the Goblin Slayer
episodes.plot:
